sharedAccess.description: Select the following options to share the application roles with the organizations.
sharedAccess.sharingRolesTakeTimeMessage: Sharing roles may take sometime to reflect across the organization.

modes.shareWithAll: Share a common set of roles with all organizations
modes.shareWithSelected: Share different set of roles with each organization
modes.shareAllRolesWithAllOrgs: Share all roles with all organizations

error.description: An error occurred while fetching the roles.
An error occurred while fetching the organization tree.
An error occurred while sharing the roles.
